title: International Motor Show Germany
summary: The International MobilityShow Germany or simply International Mobility Show, in German known as the Internationale Automobil-Ausstellung (IAA â€“ International Automobile Exhibition), is the world's largest mobility show. It is held annually, with mobility solutions (including passenger vehicles, motorcycles and bikes) being displayed as the IAA Mobility Show[1] in odd-numbered years in Munich, and IAA Transportation[2] for commercial vehicles in even-numbered years in Hanover, Germany. Before 1991, the show was held solely in Frankfurt.
